languages.text: "Души, что терзали Вени'Заккари... Они отвергли смерть? Или Неумирающий все же принял их в свои длани?"
"The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"
languages.original_text: "Души, что терзали Вени'Заккари... Они отвергли смерть? Или Неумирающий все же принял их в свои длани?"

traits.locale_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"
"The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"
"The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

"The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

languages.text: "Die Seelen, die Veni'Zacchary gepeinigt haben ... Haben sie den Tod abgelehnt? Oder hat der Todlose sie letzten Endes doch noch in seine Umarmung genommen?"
languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Seelen, die Veni'Zacchary gepeinigt haben ... Haben sie den Tod abgelehnt? Oder hat der Todlose sie letzten Endes doch noch in seine Umarmung genommen?"

languages.text: « Les âmes qui tourmentaient Veni'Zacchary... Ont-elles rejeté la mort ? Ou l'Immortel a-t-il fini par les accueillir dans Son giron ? »
languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

traits.locale_text: « Les âmes qui tourmentaient Veni'Zacchary... Ont-elles rejeté la mort ? Ou l'Immortel a-t-il fini par les accueillir dans Son giron ? »

languages.text: «Las almas que atormentaban a Veni'Zacchary... ¿rechazaron la muerte? ¿O las aceptó el Inmortal en Sus manos al final?».
languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

traits.locale_text: «Las almas que atormentaban a Veni'Zacchary... ¿rechazaron la muerte? ¿O las aceptó el Inmortal en Sus manos al final?».

languages.text: 「ザッカリーを苦しめた魂…彼らは死を拒絶したのか？それとも不死の者がやつらを彼の腕の中へと招き入れたのか？」
languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

traits.locale_text: 「ザッカリーを苦しめた魂…彼らは死を拒絶したのか？それとも不死の者がやつらを彼の腕の中へと招き入れたのか？」

languages.text: “那些之前折磨帷者扎卡里的灵魂……他们是拒绝了死亡吗？还是说，不死之神最终将他们带了回去？”
languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

traits.locale_text: “那些之前折磨帷者扎卡里的灵魂……他们是拒绝了死亡吗？还是说，不死之神最终将他们带了回去？”

languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"

languages.text: "Veni'Zacchary'ye eziyet eden ruhlar... Ölümü reddetmişler miydi? Yoksa Ölmeyen, en nihayetinde onlara ellerini uzatmış mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "The souls that tormented Veni'Zacchary... Did they reject death? Or did the Undying One accept them into His hands in the end?"
